EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal at Cloud Foundry Summit and Get 20% Off Your Pass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://goo.gl/IYof6n]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As software transforms industries across the world, more companies are embracing software as a core competency to differentiate themselves with customers and capture new opportunities. But how do you get there?
Join thousands of developers at Cloud Foundry Summit <[[https://goo.gl/IYof6n]]>, from June 13 - 15, 2017, in Silicon Valley to learn how to streamline your development pipeline in your language and framework of choice.
<[[https://goo.gl/IYof6n]]>
You will learn how to:
- Leverage best practices from customers and users of Cloud Foundry - Use Cloud Foundry in Java, Node.js, Ruby and more - Manage and take containers into production at scale - Run applications across multiple clouds
Register today <[[https://goo.gl/IYof6n]]> and use the Pivotal discount code CFSV17PIV20 to get 20% off your Cloud Foundry Summit pass. We hope to see you there!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
